T16D4411:347a-3: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa /
T16D4411:347b-0: dkon @347b mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16D4411:347b-1: rmi ngan 'jigs dang sdig pa thams cad 'jig byed pa //
T16D4411:347b-2: tshe dang 'byor dang stobs dang bde ba rnam 'phel byed //
T16D4411:347b-3: khyed kyi bkra shes thams cad sgrub par byed 'di
T16D4411:347b-4: dag / rab tu brjod kyis de phyir mi rnams
T16D4411:347b-5: bsgrims te nyon // sangs rgyas padma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba //
T16D4411:347b-6: gser gyi mdog can 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig pu dang //
T16D4411:347b-7: chos dang dge 'dun lha dang lha min gyis bstod pa //
T16D4411:347b-8: bkra shis rnam par 'phel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:347b-9: bdud stobs rab tu 'joms pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa //
T16D4411:347b-10: rnam snang mdzad dang thams cad skyob dang rnam par gzigs //
T16D4411:347b-11: kun du mchod sbyin rgyas par 'gyur ba gzi brjid
T16D4411:347b-12: mchog / bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu
T16D4411:347b-13: dran par byed // padma'i spyan dang sh'akya thub pa thub chen dang //
T16D4411:347b-14: ye shes dbang phyug spyan legs pa dang zla zhal dang //
T16D4411:347b-15: 'brug gi sgra dang rnga sgra lta bur dbyangs snyan pa //
T16D4411:347b-16: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:347b-17: 'od zer rgyal mtshan dang ni gser thub 'od srungs dang //
T16D4411:347b-18: mar me mdzad pa shin tu brjid par gshegs pa dang /
T16D4411:347b-19: 'dren pa gtsug tor can dang 'od tog dpag med 'od //
T16D4411:347b-20: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:347b-21: padma mdzes dang ye shes stobs dang zla 'od dang //
T16D4411:347b-22: nyi ma'i zhal dang dgra las rgyal dang rgyal bltams dang //
T16D4411:347b-23: yon tan 'byung gnas dpal gyi gzi brjid 'jig rten gtso //
T16D4411:347b-24: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:347b-25: mi 'khrugs pa ni rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa dang //
T16D4411:347b-26: 'dren pa mchog sbyin rin chen tog tu bcas pa dang //
T16D4411:347b-27: rnam par spel dang lag na rin chen rgyal mtshan
T16D4411:347b-28: mchog / bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu
T16D4411:347b-29: dran par byed / 'jig rten dbang phyug rtag tu rgal dbang gtsug tor can //
T16D4411:347b-30: ston zla dri med lta bur zhal ras mdzes pa dang /
T16D4411:347b-31: nam mkha'i snying po dang ni sa yi snying po dag /
T16D4411:347b-32: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:347b-33: 'jam dpal gtsug phud shin tu mdzes pas rab brgyan cing //
T16D4411:347b-34: gzhon nu'i gzugs ni gser mdog 'od dang ldan pa dang //
T16D4411:347b-35: rtag tu rgyal bar dka' ba lag na rdo rje dpal //
T16D4411:347b-36: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:348a-1: shin tu rmad du byung ba'i gzugs mnga' ba //
T16D4411:348a-2: lcang lo'i 'khril mnga' mchod rten gtsug tor gnas pa dang //
T16D4411:348a-3: kun du bzang dang nor bzang dang ni sgra gcan 'dzin //
T16D4411:348a-4: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:348a-5: skul byed ma dang sgrol ma khro gnyer 'gro phan dang //
T16D4411:348a-6: de bzhin shes rab la sogs pha rol phyin drug dang //
T16D4411:348a-7: rma bya dang ni 'phags ma gzhan gyis mi thub bcas //
T16D4411:348a-8: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:348a-9: gtsug tor las byung gsang sngags rjes 'dzin bcas pa dang //
T16D4411:348a-10: phyir ldog ma dang bsil ba'i tshal na rgyal las 'khrungs //
T16D4411:348a-11: lha mo ri khrod lo ma can dang bcas pa rnams //
T16D4411:348a-12: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:348a-13: don yod grub dang stong chen rab tu 'joms pa dang //
T16D4411:348a-14: grong khyer b'a r'a na s'i zhes byar grags pa dang //
T16D4411:348a-15: bad sa'i snying po gcig dang ku sha'i gyad ldan pa //
T16D4411:348a-16: bkra shes rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:348a-17: rdo rje lcags kyi dang ni gtsug 'phyang 'od po che //
T16D4411:348a-18: de bzhin bgegs 'joms 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang //
T16D4411:348a-19: zla 'od de yang gzhon nu'i gzugs dang ldan pa ni //
T16D4411:348a-20: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:348a-21: gshin rje gshed po 'jigs kun rab tu 'joms mdzad dang //
T16D4411:348a-22: padma mthar byed gnod mdzes de bzhin 'khor lo can //
T16D4411:348a-23: gzhan gyis mi thub dbyug sngon bsnams par mdzad pa
T16D4411:348a-24: dag / bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu
T16D4411:348a-25: dran par byed // 'phags pa mi g-yo bgegs rigs rab tu 'joms pa dang //
T16D4411:348a-26: phun sum tshogs byed rmugs 'dzin autpal mdog can dang //
T16D4411:348a-27: glang chen ko rlon stag lpags dag gis brgyan gyur pa //
T16D4411:348a-28: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:348a-29: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu dang mood gal 'od srungs dang //
T16D4411:348a-30: nor bu 'dzin dang ma 'gags nye ba 'khor dang bcas //
T16D4411:348a-31: rab 'byor dang ni lus 'phags ri bo kun dga' bo //
T16D4411:348a-32: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:348a-33: stobs chen bgegs kyi rigs ni rab tu 'joms pa dang //
T16D4411:348a-34: 'od zer ldan dang cha byad rab tu mdzes pa dang //
T16D4411:348a-35: dug sel sbrul gdug rgyags pa rab tu 'jigs byed pa //
T16D4411:348a-36: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:348a-37: 'phrog ma rna cha rnam pa sna tshogs g-yo 'gul ba //
T16D4411:348b-0: @348b bu pho lnga brgya dag gis brgyan par gyur pa dang //
T16D4411:348b-1: gnod sbyin bdag po lngas rtsen dang ni padma'i mig
T16D4411:348b-2: / bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran
T16D4411:348b-3: par byed // ha la ha la sems can kun la phan mdzad dang /
T16D4411:348b-4: rin chen sgron mar grags dang nor gyi rgyun mchog dang //
T16D4411:348b-5: gnod sbyin bdag po rnam thos sras po dpal thob pa //
T16D4411:348b-6: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:348b-7: thams cad sgrol ba sbyin phod dam pa gzi chen dang //
T16D4411:348b-8: byams pa'i stobs ni gtong ba'i stobs chen ldan pa dang /
T16D4411:348b-9: sprin gyi mdog dang ldan pa'i bu ni gang yin pa //
T16D4411:348b-10: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed ;
T16D4411:348b-11: / rab tu dga' ba la sogs sa bcu de dag dang //
T16D4411:348b-12: dpa' bas byin pa de dang gtsug na nor bu dang //
T16D4411:348b-13: rgyal po dam pa zas gtsang dang ni ka pi ni //
T16D4411:348b-14: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:348b-15: lumbi'i tshal na bung ba mang po 'phur lding dang //
T16D4411:348b-16: me tog 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan //
T16D4411:348b-17: rma bya dang ni khu byug pho mo sgra 'byin pa //
T16D4411:348b-18: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:348b-19: btsun mo sgyu 'phrul dang ni de bzhin goo ta mi //
T16D4411:348b-20: sh'akya'i bu mo rdzu 'phrul chen mo grags 'dzin dang //
T16D4411:348b-21: nee ranydza na bsod nams ldan pa'i 'bab chur bcas //
T16D4411:348b-22: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:348b-23: 'jig rten dbang phyug padma bung ba khyus lding dang //
T16D4411:348b-24: 'jam dpal autpal sngon po yid du 'ong ba dang //
T16D4411:348b-25: mgon po byams pa yi ni klu shing me tog rnams //
T16D4411:348b-26: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:348b-27: rnam snang mdzad pa zla 'od lta bu'i 'khor lo dang //
T16D4411:348b-28: dpal thob rin chen nor bu 'od dang ldan pa dang //
T16D4411:348b-29: mgon po 'od dpag med pa'i padma dam pa mchog
T16D4411:348b-30: / bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran
T16D4411:348b-31: par byed // don yod grub pas legs bsnams ral gri mchog dang ni /
T16D4411:348b-32: mi bskyod rdo rje nyid dang gzhan yang ni //
T16D4411:348b-33: skyob pa thams cad kyi ni phyag mtshan ma lus pa //
T16D4411:348b-34: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:348b-35: yid bzhin nor bu 'dod 'jo'i ba dang bcas pa dang //
T16D4411:348b-36: dpag bsam gyi ni shing dang bum pa bzang po dang //
T16D4411:348b-37: rgyal ba kun gyis nges par bsten pa'i byang chub shing //
T16D4411:348b-38: bkra shis rnam par spel phyir rtag tu dran par byed //
T16D4411:349a-1: dus dang nor dang 'bru rnams sdud pa dang //
T16D4411:349a-2: nang par dus sam yang na zhi ba'i las tshe'am //
T16D4411:349a-3: dga' ston kun na 'dug dang dgos pa sgrub pa na //
T16D4411:349a-4: ming mtshan 'di dag mi yis rab tu bsgrims te gdon //
T16D4411:349a-5: rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i sras kyi mtshan ni ma lus pa //
T16D4411:349a-6: lha la gus bzhin nyin gcig bzhin du nang bar sus brjod pa //
T16D4411:349a-7: de dag sems can dmyal ba'i dogs dang bral zhing bde ba dang //
T16D4411:349a-8: dpal dang ldan zhing nad kun 'joms la nor dang ldan par 'gyur //
T16D4411:349a-9: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T16D4411:349a-11: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
